price: “Fuula kee qajeelaa taasisii guutumatti amantiitti gara galchi; mushrikoota irraa hin ta’in” (naanjedhame).
arabic: وَأَنۡ أَقِمۡ وَجۡهَكَ لِلدِّينِ حَنِيفٗا وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-an aqim wajhaka lilddīni ḥanīfan walā takūnanna mina al-mush'rikīna
